verses.roman:
etat saṅkalpa-vaiṣamyaṁ
hotus te vyabhicārataḥ
tathāpi sādhayiṣye te
suprajāstvaṁ sva-tejasā

synonyms: etat—this; saṅkalpa-vaiṣamyam—discrepancy in the objective; hotuḥ—of the priest; te—your; vyabhicārataḥ—from deviating from the prescribed purpose; tathā api—still; sādhayiṣye—I shall execute; te—for you; su-prajāstvam—a very nice son; sva-tejasā—by my own prowess.
translation: This discrepancy in the objective is due to your priest's deviation from the original purpose. However, by my own prowess I shall give you a good son.
